prompt: Below you can see information about the particular policy on the left and which of the politicians voted for the policy on the right. Remember that each politician knows a) how many people are in the committee, b) how many votes are required for the policy to be passed, c) what the different politicians' party affiliations are, and d) whether the policy is supported by the Democratic or Republican party.
text: Please use the sliders below to indicate to what extent the different politicians are responsible for the outcome of the vote.

questions.q: To what extent is {{voter1}} responsible that the policy was {{outcome}}?
To what extent is {{voter2}} responsible that the policy was {{outcome}}?
